import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { test : Date = new Date(); constructor(private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit() { } getPath(){ return this.router.url; } }
